name: Hidden Forest (itch)
description:
You play as a scientist that has conducted an experiment to shrink down to fairy size. Your goal is to navigate through the forest and collect as much fairy dust as possible, you will run into difficult and challenging enemies throughout your journey. You will have to prove your strength against the fairies in order to escape! Good luck on your adventure!

This game was created by Harry Dougan and David McMahon as part of our final project for a Level 3 Extended diploma in Games, Animation and VFX.
